





## Input:

	Position of Point (Vector3)
	Oriented Box Center (Vector3)
	Oriented Box Half Extensions (Vector3)
	Oriented Box Orientation (Matrix3, or 3 Vector3's)
	
## Output:

	Closest Point (Vector3)
